title: [W]Claimant notice period
p1: [W]It may help the tribunal if you can provide this detail. You will not be penalised for not providing it.

et3ResponseIsNoticeCorrect.label: [W]Are the claimant’s notice period details correct?

et3ResponseCorrectNoticeDetails.label: [W]What are the claimant’s correct notice details? (optional)
et3ResponseCorrectNoticeDetails.hint: [W]For example, you may wish to clarify that the claimant was dismissed without notice or paid them a sum in lieu of notice.

et3ResponseCorrectNoticeDetails.tooLong: [W]The claimant notice period entered must be less than 2500 characters

hiddenErrorField.sessionRespondent: [W]Unable to find selected respondent in session
hiddenErrorField.userId: [W]Invalid session user. User does not have an ID
hiddenErrorField.api: [W]A system error occurred, Please try again later
